price: Enti εberε a nkoyaayifoͻ no baeε no, wͻka kyerεε Farao sε: “Sε εkͻba sε yɛdi nkonim a yεbenya akatua bi anaa?”
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالُواْ لِفِرۡعَوۡنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجۡرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falammā jāa al-saḥaratu qālū lifir'ʿawna a-inna lanā la-ajran in kunnā naḥnu al-ghālibīna
